displayName: Somewhere In The Unreasonably Large Walk-In Closet
shortName: somewhere in the unreasonably large walk-in closet
description:
The bowties set up a cry, hundreds at once, and then rush you! You slap them from the sky, grabbing and ripping, leaving a path of silk guts and cotton wings strewn all around the glade. Eventually, the swarm flees, silently flowing back into the forest. You stand, trumphant, amid dozens of torn bowties.

Then something kicks your legs out from under you, and you fall to the ground. Before you can react, everything goes black.

[[Wake up.->hall]].
